The military is foundational for North Dakota culture. These subcommittees help ensure our military community will continue to be a hub for new innovation and security for the entire country.
The Emerging Threats and Capabilities Sub-Committee is responsible for programs related to emerging technologies, which includes space research projects that have a nexus to the @UofNorthDakota.

The Airland Sub-Committee oversees the Army and Air Force, giving me direct nexus to bases in Grand Forks and Minot. 

It also oversees the National Guard, which has nearly 4,000 soldiers and airmen dispersed across the state, especially Bismarck and Fargo.

My seat on the Strategic Forces Sub-Committee has wide jurisdiction over our Nuclear forces and missile defenses. 

Serving on this committee will be of benefit to the ICBM and B-52 Bomber missions at @TeamMinot.
